reuters.title: U.S. SELLS 3-MO BILLS AT 5.47 PCT, STOP 5.48 PCT, 6-MO 5.51 PCT, STOP 5.51 PCT
reuters.body: Computer Language Research Inc said its CLR/Micro-Tax unit introduced a Micro-Tax W-4 Generator, a new software package for accounts and corporate personnel departments. The company said the package takes the user through each question on the new W-4, gives explanatory instructions, automatically calculates entries, checks tables and generates the completed W-4. Reuter 
